entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/ccc-config/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.0.1 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=50m -p CPU_LIMIT=100m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=64Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=128Mi -p BASEURL=geo-i.so.ch | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration ccc-config oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc ccc-config
